UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Characterization of an antimicrobial pentapeptide produced by a drug-sensitive Pseudomonas aeruginosa strain PAST18.
Literature.Author: Deb S, Dutta TK
